result.title: First contest's editorial
result.content:
This time, due to technical issues, connected with the organisation of our first contest, the editorial is a little bit late

Editorial of problems A, B, C can be found there, on Google Drive (this folder will contain this and all future editorials), if you have any questions — you may ask us, and we will probably answer them

According to issues, mentioned above, problem D did not have test groups (you didn't try to do them, thougn, so this didn't affect the contest's result), but it did on the original contest (more precisely, the last stage of ООУИ). Considering this fact and the high difficulty of the problem, it would be better, if you read the original problem and editorial, which also has a link to a gym, where you can send your solution

It would be cool if you solved them :)

P.S. a piece of advice for future: solve stupid and obvious test groups, even if you think that you know the full solution, because if the full solution doesn't work out, you'll have at least some points
